Schedule

The precise room numbers and schedule is in preparation, but the important dates are:

  • Royal Botanic Gardens Kew (8-10 November)
  • Royal Botanic Gardens Edinburgh (14-16 November)

Participation in the workshop is free, but participants must bring their own laptop. Some basic software and libraries should be installed in advance to use the time effectively, with instructions posted here. Most of the work will occur on institutional clusters to remove barriers to participation, with precise instructions TBD.

Time Module Slides
Day 1 Morning The Multispecies Coalescent and Gene Flow TBD
Day 1 Afternoon Full-Likelihood Analyses with BPP TBD
Day 2 Morning Quartets, Concordance Factors, and Network Identifiability TBD
Day 2 Afternoon Maximum Pseudo-Likelihood Analyses with PhyloNetworks TBD
